TopicTitle: Vaccers Small Pack Of Wonders(Nacelles, Junk and Repconn)

Articles.Content:
Well due to the last few game updates breaking my mods I decided to fix the textures and re-release them in 1 big pack, it now includes my Liquid Warp Nacelles, Junk Parts, and the first rocket of the Repconn Rockets pack.

Includes

*4 nacelle fuel tanks with way too much fuel. Facing in 4 different directions.

*4 liquid engines with a whole lot of thrust and low fuel consumption to accelerate you to great speeds. There\'s one for each nacelle. I\'d increase thrust but many connecting parts hate the high thrust as is.

*1 Nacelle cap that acts as a S.A.S module. I told you I was going to add it and I hope your happy with it. I was hoping to get a more flowy looking texture on the red part, but I\'m happy with it for now.

*1 3M Heavy Lift Engine

*1 2m Heavy lift Engine

*THE MONOLITH

*1 Solid Cannon Booster Rocket

*Repconn R-100 Fuel Tank

*Repconn R-100 Engine

*Repconn R-100 Wing(acts as a control surface still buggy)

Test Video of the 2&3m rockets

[glow=red,2,300]Repconn Rocket Test video[/glow]

[glow=red,2,300]Download Here[/glow]

http://dl.dropbox.com/u/42863458/VaccersmallpackofwondersVer1_1.zip

[glow=red,2,300]CURRENT WORK[/glow]

Now working on a new part set of some of the repconn rockets from Fallout: New Vegas. When I finish the first 3 planned I\'ll release a test pack for you guys to play with and test. Currently 1 down(mostly, I need to tweak the fins a bit more), 2 to go, check latest posts for progress.
This looks like one of the best nacelle mods so far. How's the work on it going?
Oh boy, Phoenix mission is on its' way
That does look rather excellent. Really looking forward to testing them out.
Looks pretty awesome, very ..art deco?
We're all anxious to try....go ahead and release them now! Can they be bottom mounted, to prevent them ripping off like the other nacelles?

I'm currently testing these in the newest game version, will post a dl when done, sorry to say I was busy today and couldn't make the nacelle caps, although I improved the nacelle texture slightly.

The nacelles are just over-sized narrow fuel tanks with top and bottom mounts, the engines have top and bottom mounts to but mounting something on the bottom of the engine just looks silly.
It is Wobbly - Just Turn down your Thrust some and it goes away. You prolly have To much Kick behind them.

Possibility to have it posted at a mirror? Been waiting eagerly for this one.

Possibility to have it posted at a mirror? Been waiting eagerly for this one.

Megaupload states: The file you are trying to access is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

Possibility to have it posted at a mirror? Been waiting eagerly for this one.

I tried using multiupload but the upload never starts it just hangs on initializing for a hour hour or more. I'll work on getting it in a different upload site do to megaupload complaining.

I have a problem with starting the game when i have this mod installed. Any thoughts why?

I wouldn't see why, I finally got them working after much trial and error a while ago, although some other people have had problems getting some mods to work in the game.

Megaupload states: The file you are trying to access is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

Possibility to have it posted at a mirror? Been waiting eagerly for this one.

That just happened to me, but I reaccessed it, and the download was there.

Any good suggestions besides megaupload then? I'm still trying mutliupload but it never starts uploading

Also to the guy who the mod make the game not load, only put the nacelle, nacellea, nacelleb, nacellec, nacellengine, nacellenginea, nacellengineb, nacellenginec folders in the parts folder, not the readme or the higher containing(vaccersnacelles) folder of them.
for now I had no problems with them, they work like a charm, but they are VERY THREATENINGLY WOBBLY. Like, liftoff, and they move like a mechanical rodeo bull

Any good suggestions besides megaupload then?

Mediafire is decent.

I'm currently trying to fix the wobblyness, I think it's due to the origin of the engine piece. But the tanks wobble more than I originally noticed. I'm not sure how to fix this issue, hopefully another modder can give me some insight.

I'll have another upload up soon in case megaupload decides to refuse access to the download again.
Sexy, classy, AND adjustable ;D thank you for these!

Ver 1.1 is out and apparently no one will notice unless I add a new post. Fixed most of the wobblyness, added nacelle cap.

http://www.megaupload.com/?d=A5VONLPF

I've been having issues with uploads. So hopefully mega decides to cooperate with people this time.

Here's a little preview of whats to come in future releases, it's a little nuts to be 3m, maybe if people started making stock 2m part it'd fit in a little better.
These are nice and stable now, Good job mate :w00t:
Looks much nicer as 1.6 meter doesn't it?

Ver 1.1 is out and apparently no one will notice unless I add a new post.

Yup, just modify your original post and when ready to show the world, post a quick reply to let everyone know there's an update and up to the top of the forums you go!

Cheers!

SKunky

Also, are these black struts going to be in the next update too or it's just a little something you put up?

Or is it already out but part of another pack I haven't noticed?
Yeah, and whats up with the rainbow cone?

The black struts a Trilateral Coupler I'm working on to fit a 1-2m rocket between the Nacelles. And the Rainbowcone is a 1m to 1.6m Adapter shroud I've yet to texture as I usually bake the normals to the texture to figure out the uv easier.

I'm currently working on a few parts and am testing them for the next pack, not all of the smoothing groups or textures have been finished yet.

Also I've been trying my hardest to get a massive 9m wide rocket into orbit using combination's of my parts along with Sunday punches 3m parts. If I manage something huge no doubt I'll release a 3m version of the 1.6m engine.
